posts.post_content:
I am working on finishing off a T206 Philadelphia A's set (w/o Plank). Thanks to those who've helped me already. I have 18 of the 21. Looking for the following in PSA 3/4 (will take slightly lower or higher grade depending on the card):
 
Chief Bender - No trees
Paddy Livingstone - fielding
Harry Davis - Davis
 
Let me know what you have. Thanks.
 
-Jim

$125 delivered, including insurance and delivery confirmation.   PayPal OK.

[IMG]http://i222.photobucket.com/albums/dd47/BlueDevilSportscards/T206%201909-1911/DannyMurphy_ThrowingT206SweetCap-1.jpg[/IMG]

Hi Jim,
PM sent re available Murphy PSA 3 and Livingstone ungraded (likely a 3-4).
Hope that helps.
--S
